trans-unit.source: This section provides information on creating Universal Windows app that capture, playback, or edit photos, videos, or audio.
trans-unit.target: This section provides information on creating Universal Windows app that capture, playback, or edit photos, videos, or audio.

trans-unit.source: Audio, video, and camera
trans-unit.target: Audio, video, and camera

trans-unit.source: Audio, video, and camera
trans-unit.target: Audio, video, and camera

trans-unit.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]

trans-unit.source: This section provides information on creating Universal Windows app that capture, playback, or edit photos, videos, or audio.
trans-unit.target: This section provides information on creating Universal Windows app that capture, playback, or edit photos, videos, or audio.

trans-unit.source: Topic
trans-unit.target: Topic

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Capture photos and video with CameraCaptureUI
trans-unit.target: Capture photos and video with CameraCaptureUI

trans-unit.source: This article describes how to use the [CameraCaptureUI](capture-photos-and-video-with-cameracaptureui.md) class to capture photos or videos using the camera UI built into Windows.
trans-unit.target: This article describes how to use the [CameraCaptureUI](capture-photos-and-video-with-cameracaptureui.md) class to capture photos or videos using the camera UI built into Windows.

trans-unit.source: Capture photos and video with MediaCapture
trans-unit.target: Capture photos and video with MediaCapture

trans-unit.source: This article describes the steps for capturing photos and video using the [MediaCapture](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br241124) API, including initializing and shutting down the MediaCapture and handling changes in device orientation.
trans-unit.target: This article describes the steps for capturing photos and video using the [MediaCapture](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br241124) API, including initializing and shutting down the MediaCapture and handling changes in device orientation.

trans-unit.source: Detect faces in images or videos
trans-unit.target: Detect faces in images or videos

trans-unit.source: This topic shows how to use the [FaceTracker](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974150) is optimized for tracking faces over time in a sequence of video frames.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows how to use the [FaceTracker](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn974150) is optimized for tracking faces over time in a sequence of video frames.

trans-unit.source: Media compositions and editing
trans-unit.target: Media compositions and editing

trans-unit.source: The APIs in the [Microsoft Media Foundation](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms694197) API.
trans-unit.target: The APIs in the [Microsoft Media Foundation](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms694197) API.

trans-unit.source: Imaging
trans-unit.target: Imaging

trans-unit.source: This article explains how to load and save image files using [SoftwareBitmap](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn887358) object to represent bitmap images.
trans-unit.target: This article explains how to load and save image files using [SoftwareBitmap](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn887358) object to represent bitmap images.

trans-unit.source: Transcode media files
trans-unit.target: Transcode media files

trans-unit.source: You can use the [Windows.Media.Transcoding](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br207105) APIs to transcode video files from one format to another.
trans-unit.target: You can use the [Windows.Media.Transcoding](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br207105) APIs to transcode video files from one format to another.

trans-unit.source: Process media files in the background
trans-unit.target: Process media files in the background

trans-unit.source: This article shows you how to use the [MediaProcessingTrigger](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn806005) and a background task to process media files in the background.
trans-unit.target: This article shows you how to use the [MediaProcessingTrigger](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn806005) and a background task to process media files in the background.

trans-unit.source: Media playback with MediaSource
trans-unit.target: Media playback with MediaSource

trans-unit.source: The [MediaSource](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn930905) class provides a common way to reference and play back media from different sources such as local or remote files and exposes a common model for accessing media data, regardless of the underlying media format.
trans-unit.target: The [MediaSource](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn930905) class provides a common way to reference and play back media from different sources such as local or remote files and exposes a common model for accessing media data, regardless of the underlying media format.

trans-unit.source: Adaptive Streaming
trans-unit.target: Adaptive Streaming

trans-unit.source: This article describes how to add playback of adaptive streaming multimedia content to a Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps.
trans-unit.target: This article describes how to add playback of adaptive streaming multimedia content to a Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps.

trans-unit.source: This feature currently supports playback of Http Live Streaming (HLS) and Dynamic Streaming over HTTP (DASH) content.
trans-unit.target: This feature currently supports playback of Http Live Streaming (HLS) and Dynamic Streaming over HTTP (DASH) content.

trans-unit.source: Background Audio
trans-unit.target: Background Audio

trans-unit.source: This article describes how to create UWP apps that play audio in the background.
trans-unit.target: This article describes how to create UWP apps that play audio in the background.

trans-unit.source: System Media Transport Controls
trans-unit.target: System Media Transport Controls

trans-unit.source: The [SystemMediaTransportControls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn278677) class enables your app to use the system media transport controls that are built into Windows and to update the metadata that the controls display about the media your app is currently playing.
trans-unit.target: The [SystemMediaTransportControls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn278677) class enables your app to use the system media transport controls that are built into Windows and to update the metadata that the controls display about the media your app is currently playing.

trans-unit.source: Media casting
trans-unit.target: Media casting

trans-unit.source: This article shows you how to cast media to remote devices from a Universal Windows app.
trans-unit.target: This article shows you how to cast media to remote devices from a Universal Windows app.

trans-unit.source: Audio Graphs
trans-unit.target: Audio Graphs

trans-unit.source: This article shows how to use the APIs in the [Windows.Media.Audio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn914341) namespace to create audio graphs for audio routing, mixing, and processing scenarios.
trans-unit.target: This article shows how to use the APIs in the [Windows.Media.Audio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn914341) namespace to create audio graphs for audio routing, mixing, and processing scenarios.

trans-unit.source: MIDI
trans-unit.target: MIDI

trans-unit.source: This article shows you how to enumerate MIDI (Musical Instrument Digital Interface) devices and send and receive MIDI messages from a Universal Windows app.
trans-unit.target: This article shows you how to enumerate MIDI (Musical Instrument Digital Interface) devices and send and receive MIDI messages from a Universal Windows app.

trans-unit.source: Camera-independent Flashlight
trans-unit.target: Camera-independent Flashlight

trans-unit.source: This article shows how to access and use a device's lamp, if one is present.
trans-unit.target: This article shows how to access and use a device's lamp, if one is present.

trans-unit.source: Lamp functionality is managed separately from the device's camera and camera flash functionality.
trans-unit.target: Lamp functionality is managed separately from the device's camera and camera flash functionality.

trans-unit.source: Supported codecs
trans-unit.target: Supported codecs

trans-unit.source: This article lists the audio and video codec and format support for UWP apps.
trans-unit.target: This article lists the audio and video codec and format support for UWP apps.

trans-unit.source: PlayReady DRM
trans-unit.target: PlayReady DRM

trans-unit.source: This topic describes how to add PlayReady protected media content to your Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app.
trans-unit.target: This topic describes how to add PlayReady protected media content to your Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app.

trans-unit.source: PlayReady Encrypted Media Extension
trans-unit.target: PlayReady Encrypted Media Extension

trans-unit.source: This section describes how to modify your PlayReady Web app to support the changes made from the previous Windows 8.1 version to the Windows 10 version.
trans-unit.target: This section describes how to modify your PlayReady Web app to support the changes made from the previous Windows 8.1 version to the Windows 10 version.
